title: More Evil Kings in Israel
summary: 1 Kings 16 recounts the reigns of several kings of Israel: Baasha, Elah, Zimri, Omri, and finally Ahab. Each is worse than the last. Ahab marries Jezebel and promotes Baal worship, angering God more than any king before him.

faq.question: Who was the most wicked king mentioned in this chapter?
faq.answer: Ahab, who led Israel into deep idolatry and married Jezebel.

faq.question: What pattern is seen in Israelâ€™s leadership?
faq.answer: A cycle of wickedness, assassinations, and increasing idolatry.
